title: Looking for Dynamic Queue Buddies
body:
Hi,

I'm tired of playing solo and getting the same amount of LP compared to those who play Dynamic. So I'm looking for some people to queue up with me in ranked. I main Mid, the champions I play Mid are, Twisted Fate{{champion:4}} and Yasuo {{champion:157}} . I also play ADC, I can play Ezreal{{champion:81}} and Lucian{{champion:236}} . Add me if you want to queue up with me (ProMINscuous). 

Thanks for reading.

replies.body:
You and I will get along fine, I main Tryndamere in the JG and with TF's stun its super easier to gank. Hit me up
IGN: 
MyDadsDumbFace
